title: 115_s1306
content: Historic Downtown Preservation and Access Act This bill amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow refundable tax credits for 50 of the expenses paid or incurred by the taxpayer during the year for: (1) installing an elevator or a sprinkler system in a certified historic structure, and (2) hazardous substance abatement services with respect to a certified historic structure. The amount of each of the two credits, with respect to any taxpayer, may not exceed $50,000 per year.
